Posts.Content: Jilian61 wrote: I am scheduled to have surgery on Wednesday.  I am having a lumpectomy with breastlift right away due to the location of the tumor.  Has anyone had this procedure??  I have no idea what to expect as far as recovery.  I am also have intraoperative radiation during surgery.  I am part of a clinical trial.  Is there anyone out there with experience with this also?  Thanks for any information you can offer. Dx 7/29/2011, IDC, 1cm, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy/Breastlift/IORT Jilian61 cycle-path

Posts.Content: Sep 6, 2011 07:00PM Jilian61 wrote: Thanks for the information.  I am excited about being able to have the IORT.  Doesn't sound like too many places do it.
